verses.roman:
śṛī-śuka uvāca
apaśyatāṁ cāniruddhaṁ
tad-bandhūnāṁ ca bhārata
catvāro vārṣikā māsā
vyatīyur anuśocatām

synonyms: śrī-śukaḥ uvāca—Śukadeva Gosvāmī said; apaśyatām—who did not see; ca—and; aniruddham—Aniruddha; tat—His; bandhūnām—for the relatives; ca—and; bhārata—O descendant of Bharata (Parīkṣit Mahārāja); catvāraḥ—four; vārṣikaḥ—of the rainy season; māsāḥ—the months; vyatīyuḥ—passed; anuśocatām—who were lamenting.
translation: Śukadeva Gosvāmī said: O descendant of Bharata, the relatives of Aniruddha, not seeing Him return, continued to lament as the four rainy months passed.
